Package org.sunspotworld.create

The iRobot Create API for use from Sun SPOT applications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IBumpListener Bump listener
IRobotCreate Interface that provides a high level interface to the iRobot series of Roomba/Create robots.
IWallListener Wall listener
 

Class Summary
Create Class that is used to create a new instance of an IRobotCreate.
 

Exception Summary
OvercurrentException Thrown when an overcurrent condition has been detected.
 

Package org.sunspotworld.create Description

The iRobot Create API for use from Sun SPOT applications.

Please refer to the "Create Open Interface_v2.pdf" document found on the http://www.irobot.com site for more details.
